content.micro: Established by the Government Performance and Results Modernization Act (GPRA) of 2010, the Cross-Agency Priority (CAP) Goals aim to accelerate progress on a limited number of Presidential priority areas where implementation requires active collaboration between multiple agencies. OMB Cyber oversees and evaluates the implementation of the cybersecurity CAP Goal amongst the federal agencies. This CAP Goal has a mission statement of, “Improve cybersecurity performance through ongoing awareness of information security, vulnerabilities, and threats impacting the operating information environment, ensuring that only authorized users have access to resources and information; and the implementation of technologies and processes that reduce the risk of malware.”
